biography: Linde works with the currency of the future: light. As a Photonics Engineer, she designs and builds devices that generate, manipulate, and detect light, creating the foundation for next-generation computing and communication systems. She is precise, patient, and has a deep understanding of physics and materials science. Her work on photonic integrated circuits promises to make computation faster and more energy-efficient than ever before.
